paper_abstract: In this paper, with the help of the convergence of sequences of fuzzy numbers with respect to the Lebesgue measure, we study the relationship between convergences of sequences of fuzzy numbers with respect to the enclograph metric, the sendograph metric and the L-p metric. We prove that these convergences are equivalent under proper conditions. In addition, by applying our result, we give a new characterization of compact sets in fuzzy number space with the sendograph metric. (C) 2009 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: The equivalence of convergences of sequences of fuzzy numbers and its applications to the characterization of compact sets
